The claim was flagged by Facebook users: indicating that there were doubts about its authenticity.
The article quoted a doctor named Dr: Eugene Icsa from Westchester Memorial Hospital, but it was revealed that there is no such hospital in upstate New York, casting doubt on the credibility of the claim.
The use of a stock photo in the article: which was found to be from a different news story, raised suspicions about the accuracy of the claim.
The website where the claim was original: TheLastLineOfDefense.org, clearly stated that everything on the site is a satirical work of fiction, suggesting that the claim was not based on factual information.
